summary: Replaces the Draugr textures to make them look more like bloody zombies.
descriptionHtml:
Ironman5000 Retextures - Dark and Gory Draugr
=============================================

Changelog 05/02/12: v1.2 - Toned down the saturation plus added normal map the enhance wounds.

Changelog 24/01/12: V1.1 - Changed eye glow from blue to orange.  In response to the few comments I am planning a further update to make them appear less cartoonified and making the wounds more realistic by adding depth and a custom normal map, thanks for the feedback!

Description:

Retexture of the Draugr to make them darker and gorier with open wounds and blood.  It\'s a bit like the game House of the Dead.

If you like this mod check out my Fiendish Falmer (includes useable weapons and armour) http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=6955, and Undead Giants & Mammoths http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=6562.  I am working on more sinister creature retextures and will upload them on a regular basis, eventually leading to a horror/daedric mod

Warning: There may be an issue with female draugr eye glow hovering just above the eyes but I will try to fix this problem asap.

I am going to do an update with red eye glow when I work out how to customize glow in nifskope.

Installation:

Extract the folder into the Skyrim data folder, default folder directory should be C:\\Program Files(x86)\\Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim\\data.  If you have a mod that already retextures
the draugr then you will be prompted to overwrite files, say yes to all for this mod to take effect.

Uninstallation:

Go to the data\\textures\\actors and remove the draugr.  All gone!

Tools used:

BSAopt, the ideal Skyrim BSA extraction program
Gimp 2.0, a really useful and free image editing program
author: Ironman5000

files.changelogHtml: Changed the eye glow from blue to orange
